医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
产后服用艾氯胺酮可将产后抑郁症的风险降低四分之三产后服用低剂量艾氯胺酮可在 42 天内显着减轻产前抑郁症女性的抑郁症状，尽管短暂的神经精神副作用有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Esketamine-after-childbirth-cuts-risk-of-postnatal-depression-by-third-quarters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Esketamine-after-childbirth-cuts-risk-of-postnatal-depression-by-third-quarters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dc89c72-d7e1-43df-9ee5-4486e571c3af Sun, 14 Apr 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Esketamine after childbirth cuts risk of postnatal depression by three-quarters
研究发现睡眠策略可以提高超级马拉松成绩研究调查了睡眠管理在提高超级马拉松运动员的表现和恢复方面的作用，强调了抵消睡眠不足的负面影响的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Sleep-strategies-may-boost-ultramarathon-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Sleep-strategies-may-boost-ultramarathon-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=522fcfcc-e43f-473d-a96d-38addf012621 Sun, 14 Apr 2024 21:18:00 -0400 Sleep strategies may boost ultramarathon performance, study finds
母亲的体重会影响母乳喂养的成功吗？研究回顾了文献，探讨了母亲体型对母乳喂养成功的影响，检查了不同体型母亲的泌乳时间、乳汁量和婴儿消耗量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Does-maternal-weight-influence-breastfeeding-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240414/Does-maternal-weight-influence-breastfeeding-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da8209a-e550-44ab-97ba-1fba39f277f1 Sun, 14 Apr 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Does maternal weight influence breastfeeding success?
破译阿片受体的分子相互作用：对药物设计的影响针对阿片受体的药物有时会产生严重的副作用。世界各地每天有成千上万的人因芬太尼等阿片类药物服用过量而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Deciphering-the-molecular-interactions-of-opioid-receptors-Implications-for-drug-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Deciphering-the-molecular-interactions-of-opioid-receptors-Implications-for-drug-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2f58f8e-6d28-44aa-9a26-5993889a0238 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 17:16:00 -0400 Deciphering the molecular interactions of opioid receptors: Implications for drug design
了解遗传变异在男性不育中的作用大约七分之一的夫妇在自然受孕方面面临困难。其中一半的病例是由于男性不育——要么是由于成熟精子完全缺失，要么是数量少所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Understanding-the-role-of-genic-variants-in-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Understanding-the-role-of-genic-variants-in-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2525dbe8-c445-4d81-a869-5aec6f213e34 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 17:08:00 -0400 Understanding the role of genetic variants in male infertility
突破性研究揭示黑色素瘤对靶向治疗的抵抗策略黑色素瘤是最致命的皮肤癌。随着全球发病率上升，需要新的、更有效的治疗方法来减轻该疾病的健康负担。近年来的重要进展包括医生使用基因测试来寻找特定的突变，他们可以针对这些突变进行更个性化、更有效的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Breakthrough-study-reveals-melanomas-resistance-tropics-to-targeted-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Breakthrough-study-reveals-melanomas-resistance-tropics-to-targeted-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39a253a4-a06f-4547-bd02-ed86ff85d883 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:59:00 -0400 Breakthrough study reveals melanoma's resistance tactics to targeted therapy
研究评估多布斯裁决如何改变年轻人的永久避孕程序第一项评估多布斯诉杰克逊妇女健康组织裁决对全国年轻人永久避孕程序影响的研究今天在《美国医学会杂志》健康论坛研究信中发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Study-asseses-how-the-Dobbs-ruling-changed-permanent-contraception-procedures-among-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Study-asseses-how-the-Dobbs-ruling-changed-permanent-contraception-procedures-among-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c96d0c5-5368-4e86-b726-e595d84f1e2b Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:51:00 -0400 Study assesses how the Dobbs ruling changed permanent contraception procedures among young adults
Cas13d-NCS：RNA病毒防御的游戏规则改变者SARS-CoV-2 等 RNA 病毒的兴起凸显了对抗它们的新方法的必要性。像 CRISPR/Cas13 这样的 RNA 靶向工具功能强大，但在细胞质中效率低下，许多 RNA 病毒在细胞质中进行复制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Cas13d-NCS-A-game-changer-in-RNA-virus-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Cas13d-NCS-A-game-changer-in-RNA-virus-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632b82e8-5d11-465f-ae3b-ce589ac25b9a Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:43:00 -0400 Cas13d-NCS: A game-changer in RNA virus defense
研究人员推出了一种识别细胞器通讯中关键蛋白质的新策略浦项科技大学、大邱天主教大学医学院和首尔国立大学之间的合作推出了一种识别细胞器通讯中关键蛋白质的新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Researchers-unveil-a-novel-strategy-for-identifying-key- Proteins-in-organelle-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Researchers-unveil-a-novel-strategy-for-identifying-key- Proteins-in-organelle-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c00af2ae-b7e8-40dc-a250-d422f4703ca7 Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:36:00 -0400 Researchers unveil a novel strategy for identifying key proteins in organelle communication
肌肉力量的遗传倾向与更长的寿命和更低的疾病风险有关芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学运动与健康科学学院进行的一项研究表明，较高肌肉力量的遗传倾向预示着更长的寿命和更低的患常见疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Genetic-predisposition-for-muscle-strength-linked-to-longer-lifespan-and-lower-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240413/Genetic-predisposition-for-muscle-strength-linked-to-longer-lifespan-and-lower-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f2a8c6-a1d3-4222-a07a-f516cf6bae9b Sat, 13 Apr 2024 16:28:00 -0400 Genetic predisposition for muscle strength linked to longer lifespan and lower disease risk
